title: Rocket, fresh fig and goats cheese salad
ingredients: ['Salad', '8 fresh figs, quartered', '75g rocket leaves', '10 cherry tomatoes, halved', '4 tablespoons goats cheese, crumbled', '6 slices prosciutto or Parma ham, torn into pieces', 'Dressing', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon honey', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
